= fname =

== Syntax ==
 zoneptr.fname

== Return Value ==
Returns a string containing the filename of the zone.

== Description ==
The '''fname''' field is used to access the filename of a zone from a zone pointer (zoneptr). This field returns the actual filename used to store the zone data on disk.

== Example ==
 dilbegin show_zone_filename();
 var
    z : zoneptr;
 code
 {
    z := zhead();
    
    if (length(z.fname) < 1)
        goto failure;
    
    send("Zone filename: " + z.fname, self);
    goto cleanup;

:failure:
    send("No filename available for this zone", self);
    
:cleanup:
    return;
 } dilend
